mapper.insert: insert into tbl_auction_log (id, station_real_code, board_real_id, token, auction_times_id, auction_times_name, bs_id, board_real_name, auction_time, local_auction_id,auction_car_id,car_id,customer_id,bid_fee,cutting_sign) values (#{id}, #{stationRealCode}, #{boardRealId}, #{token}, #{auctionTimesId}, #{auctionTimesName}, #{bsId}, #{boardRealName}, #{auctionTime}, #{localAuctionId},#{auctionCarId},#{carId},#{customerId},#{bidFee},#{cuttingSign})
